resources.string: Please choose the mode from the drop-down menu and adjust the temperature using the buttons

If you are an elderly user, please choose the elder option that has only the very basic function of heating and warming the room. Otherwise please select the average user that contains more advanced features.
Please use the drop down menu to adjust the air flow and the louver
Here you can see the humidity level of the room
Please use the drop down menu to choose the mode that you would like to use. If you want to activate the timer, please press the Timer Settings button to be redirected to its menu

Please choose which functions you want to use. If you want to open the air condition in "X" minutes please check the "Turn on timer in" and type on the box beneath it the minutes. If you want to close the air conditon in "X" minutes please select "Turn off timer in" and write the minutes. If you do not want any of this check the "No Timer" button.
